testcase.name: testAmazon

failure.message: Found 13 accessibility violations: 1) Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/aria-allowed-attr?application=axeAPI a) ["#twotabsearchtextbox"] Fix any of the following: ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-expanded="false" 2) IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/duplicate-id-aria?application=axeAPI a) ["#ape_Gateway_right-7_desktop_iframe","div:nth-child(2) > a"] Fix any of the following: Document has multiple elements referenced with ARIA with the same id attribute: adLink 3) id attribute value must be unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/duplicate-id?application=axeAPI a) ["#ape_Gateway_right-7_desktop_iframe","svg[version=\"\\31 \\.1\"][focusable=\"false\"][viewBox=\"\\30 \\ 0\\ 19\\ 19\"]:nth-child(1) > defs > lineargradient"] Fix any of the following: Document has multiple static elements with the same id attribute 4) Frames must have a unique title attribute: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/frame-title-unique?application=axeAPI a) ["#ape_Gateway_desktop-ad-center-1_desktop_iframe"] Fix all of the following: Element's title attribute is not unique b) ["#ape_Gateway_right-7_desktop_iframe"] Fix all of the following: Element's title attribute is not unique 5) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) [".navFooterLinkCol.navAccessibility:nth-child(1) > .navFooterColHead[role=\"heading\"][aria-level=\"\\36 \"]"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid 6) element must have a lang attribute: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/html-has-lang?application=axeAPI a) ["#ape_Gateway_desktop-ad-center-1_desktop_iframe","html"] Fix any of the following: The element does not have a lang attribute b) ["#ape_Gateway_right-7_desktop_iframe","html"] Fix any of the following: The element does not have a lang attribute 7) Images must have alternate text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/image-alt?application=axeAPI a) ["#ape_Gateway_desktop-ad-center-1_desktop_iframe",".ad-background-image"] Fix any of the following: Element does not have an alt attribute aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation" Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" 8) Text of buttons and links should not be repeated in the image alternative: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/image-redundant-alt?application=axeAPI a) ["a[aria-label=\"Gucci\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text b) ["a[aria-label=\"Chanel\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text c) ["a[aria-label=\"Louis\\ Vuitton\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text d) ["a[aria-label=\"Dior\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text e) ["a[aria-label=\"Clothes\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text f) ["a[aria-label=\"Accessories\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text g) ["a[aria-label=\"Sandals\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text h) ["a[aria-label=\"Swimwear\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text i) ["a[aria-label=\"PC\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text j) ["a[aria-label=\"Wireless\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text k) ["a[aria-label=\"Software\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text l) ["a[aria-label=\"Home\\ entertainment\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text m) ["a[aria-label=\"Beauty\\ \\&\\ wellness\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text n) ["a[aria-label=\"Handmade\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates
